text:
="preserve">Anthony Peter Dunne (24 July 1941 – 8 June 2020) was an Irish footballer. He appeared at left-back for Manchester United. He won 33 caps for the Republic of Ireland, playing for the national team during 1962 to 1975. He was Irish Footballer of the Year in 1969. He was born in Dublin.
Dunne died on 8 June 2020, aged 78.
